questions.question: Which former Janatha Vimukthi Peramuna (JVP) Parliamentarian has placed bonds to contest in the forthcoming Presidential Election?
questions.answer: Former Janatha Vimukthi Peramuna (JVP) Parliamentarian Siripala Amarasinghe has placed bonds to contest in the forthcoming Presidential Election.

questions.question: From which district did Siripala Amarasinghe serve as a Member of Parliament?
questions.answer: Siripala Amarasinghe served as a Member of Parliament from the Gampaha District.

questions.question: How many candidates have placed their deposits with the Election Commission to contest for the presidency thus far?
questions.answer: A total of 15 candidates have placed their deposits with the Election Commission to contest for the presidency thus far.

questions.question: How many independent candidates have placed their deposits for the presidential election?
questions.answer: Six independent candidates have placed their deposits for the presidential election.

questions.question: How many candidates from recognized political parties are contesting in the presidential election?
questions.answer: Eight candidates from recognized political parties are contesting in the presidential election.

questions.question: How many candidates from other political parties are contesting in the presidential election?
questions.answer: One candidate from other political parties is contesting in the presidential election.

questions.question: On what date did Siripala Amarasinghe place his bonds to contest in the presidential election?
questions.answer: Siripala Amarasinghe placed his bonds on 05th of the month to contest in the presidential election.

questions.question: What is Siripala Amarasinghe's current political affiliation?
questions.answer: Siripala Amarasinghe is currently contesting as an independent candidate.

questions.question: Which political party did Siripala Amarasinghe represent as a Member of Parliament?
questions.answer: Siripala Amarasinghe represented the Janatha Vimukthi Peramuna (JVP) as a Member of Parliament.

questions.question: How many total categories of candidates are contesting in the presidential election?
questions.answer: There are three categories of candidates contesting in the presidential election: independent candidates, recognized political party candidates, and other political party candidates.

questions.question: What is the total number of candidates from recognized political parties and other political parties combined?
questions.answer: The total number of candidates from recognized political parties and other political parties combined is nine (eight from recognized political parties and one from other political parties).
